    All Classes and Interfaces

    Classes
    Class
    Description
    Admin
    The Admin class is a class that represents a school administrator.
    Class
    The Class class is a class that represents a course from a school.
    FileManagement
    The FileManagement class contains a variety of procedures and functions that allow the program to be used over and over again without losing progress.
    Frame
    The Frame class holds the graphical user interface's structure for the program.
    GradeCalculations
    The GradeCalculations class is used to determine the semester exam grade required to achieve a particular grade at the end of the semester or determine the semester grade overall.
    GraphicsConstants
    The GraphicsConstants class stores frequently used fields among classes of the graphics package in the Basic School Portal.
    Panel10BTeacherGrader
    The Panel10BTeacherGrader class constructs the second part of the tenth page of the project.
    Panel10TeacherGrader
    The Panel10TeacherGrader class constructs the tenth page of the project.
    Panel11TeacherMessageEdits
    The Panel11TeacherMessageEdits class constructs the eleventh page of the project.
    Panel12TeacherRosters
    The Panel12TeacherRosters class constructs the twelfth page of the project.
    Panel13AdminHomepage
    The Panel13AdminHomepage class constructs the thirteenth page of the project.
    Panel14AdminClassCreation
    The Panel14AdminClassCreation class constructs the fourteenth page of the project.
    Panel15AdminTeacherAssignments
    The Panel15AdminTeacherAssignments class constructs the fifteenth page of this project.
    Panel16AdminStudentAssignments
    The Panel16AdminStudentAssignments class constructs the sixteenth page of the project.
    Panel1Introduction
    The Panel1Introduction class creates the JPanel for the introductory page of the programl.
    Panel2Login
    The Panel2Login class constructs the second page of the project.
    Panel3Register
    The Panel3Register class constructs the third page of the project.
    Panel4CreateUsers
    The Panel4CreateUsers page constructs the fourth page of the project.
    Panel5StudentHomepage
    The Panel5StudentHomepage constructs the fifth page of the project.
    Panel6StudentGrades
    The Panel6StudentGrades class constructs the sixth page of the project.
    Panel7StudentGradeSim
    The Panel7StudentGradeSim class constructs the seventh page of the project.
    Panel8StudentRosters
    The Panel8StudentRosters class constructs the eighth page of the project.
    Panel9TeacherHomepage
    The Panel9TeacherHomepage class constructs the ninth page of the project.
    Run
    The Run class allows the Basic School Portal to run.
    School
    The School class represents a school.
    SchoolManager
    The SchoolManager class maintains the list of schools (and therefore the list of students, teachers, etc.) that are part of the database.
    Student
    The Student class is a class that represents a student.
    Teacher
    The Teacher class is a class that represents a teacher.
    User
    The User class is a class that represents a user.
